name: Aoi's Island
description:
Help Aoi escape by collecting stars and moving blocks. Inspired by Munkiki's Castles - one of the first 3D games on Nokia cellphones.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to pull/push blocks
  • C to look around in first person
  • ESC to enter pause menu

Gamepad controls:

  • D-Pad / Left Stick to move
  • A to pull/push blocks
  • Y to look around
  • START to enter pause menu

Numpad:

  • 4, 8, 2, 6 to move
  • 5 to pull/push blocks
  • 0 to look around
  • + to enter pause menu
